scripts.postbuild: (cp package.json dist/package.json && cd dist && npm install --only=production)
scripts.pack: npm run uploadAPISpec && npm run-script build && cd conf/infra && venv/bin/sam package --s3-bucket jcala-s3bucket --s3-prefix package --template-file josorio-main.yaml --output-template-file josorio-main-pack.yaml
scripts.deploy: venv/bin/sam deploy --template-file conf/infra/josorio-main-pack.yaml --stack-name lambdademo-josorio-stack --region $AWS_REGION --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
